CustomField.formula:
IF(AND(This_Month_Billed_Amount__c-Last_Month_Billed_Amount__c < 0, Cancel_Date__c = NULL), This_Month_Billed_Amount__c-Last_Month_Billed_Amount__c,0)+
IF(Cancel_Date__c <> NULL, This_Month_Billed_Amount__c,0)+
IF(AND(This_Month_Billed_Amount__c=0, ISPICKVAL(Status__c , "ACTIVE")), This_Month_Billed_Amount__c- Last_Month_Billed_Amount__c,0)
CustomField.label: Lost Revenue
